short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The markets have been rough, so we built a chrome extension to turn your red into green.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seeing a whole lot of red in the stock market these days? Us too, so we built a Chrome extension that turns your red into green.

Just download the plugin, flip the switch, and greenwash your portfolio.
